channel.title: Posts on Jiaxin Zhuang
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jiaxin Zhuang

item.description:
About Me

I am a 2nd year master student at Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University. Currently, I am advised by Prof. Ruixuan Wang, Wei-shi Zheng and Jianguo Zhang at iSEE-SYSU. I received my B.Sc. Degree from Dept. of Data science and computing, Sun Yat-sen University in 07/2018. I was a research intern of Human Cyber Physical Intelligence Integration Lab, advised by Prof. Liang Lin.

News!!: I am seeking for Ph.D from 2021 Fall. Feel free to reach out to me if you are interested.

Research Interest

Computer Vision, Interpretability, Data imbalanced.

Selected Publication

  • Jiaxin Zhuang, Jiaxin Cai, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng. Deep kNN for Medical Image ClassiÔ¨Åcation. To appear in MICCAI 2020, Peru.

  • Weipeng Li*, Jiaxin Zhuang*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Wei-Shi Zheng. Fusing Metadata and Dermoscopy Images for Skin Disease Diagnosis. In Proc. of ISBI 2020, Iowa, USA. [PDF] [code] [bib]

  • Jiaxin Zhuang*, Jiabin Cai*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng. CARE: Class Attention to Regions of Lesion for Classification on Imbalanced Data. In Proc. of MIDL 2019, London. [openreview] [code] [bib] [poster] [slides] [zhihu]

  • Zili Xu, Jiaxin Zhuang, Rong Zhang, Ruixuan Wang, Xuemei Guo and Wei-Shi Zheng. Auxiliary Decoder and Classifier for Imbalanced Skin Disease Diagnosis. To appear in AICS 2020, Hangzhou, China.

Awards & Honors

  • Jiaxin Zhuang*, Weipeng Li*, Ruixuan Wang, Jianguo Zhang, Weishi Zheng. Rank3 (out of 77 teams) MICCAI 2018 grand challenge “ISIC 2018: Skin Lesion Analysis Towards Melanoma Detection”, Task 3 “Lesion Diagnosis”, 2018. Note: top 2 teams used additional public dataset to train models. [Code], [Report]
  • Ruoyu Lan, Wenbo Feng, Jiaxin Zhuang. Meritorious Winner, Mathematical Contest In Modeling, 2017
  • Yaobing Ke, Jiahao Rao, Jiaxin Zhuang, Lishan Huang, Lin Meng. Rank 10 (Among 1117 teams) , Molecular Screening of Drugs Based on Artificial Intelligence, 2018
  • Jiaxin Zhuang. Chinese University Students Intelligent Design Competition, Third prize, 2017.
  • Excellent Students in iSEE, 2019.
  • The Second Prize Scholarship, 2015
  • The Third Prize Scholarship, 2014

Service

  • Review paper of ICIG2019, IScIDE2019

Teaching

  • TA for Deep learning (Practice Course), Sun Yat-sen Univeristy, Spring 2019
  • TA for Deep learning, Sun Yat-sen Univeristy, Spring 2018
» Updated on July-16-2020 «
